title: Working dog health Part 1  General Health including worming and vaccinations

tasks.task: Attending a webinar on working dogs' health.
subtasks: Introducing the facilitator and the guest speaker.
Discussing vaccination recommendations for working dogs.
Addressing vaccination practices and common diseases like parvovirus.
Covering worming schedules for puppies and adults.
Providing information on housing and kennel management for working dogs.
Answering questions from webinar participants about dog health, vaccination, and parasite control.
